noun.definition: The state of being comfortable, healthy, or happy.
noun.example: To improve the physical and mental wellbeing of the community.

verb.definition: To promote or ensure the wellbeing of (rare/non-standard).
verb.example: The initiative aims to wellbeing the local population.

usage_examples: Yoga can improve your sense of wellbeing.
The company cares about the wellbeing of its employees.
